column5: Hi Guys, my buddy sent me a link to buy a licence on line.  But I can't get it to work.  Anyone have a link for a first time buyer.  Thanks
Pretty sure you have to buy the first licence in person. You can renew it online only.
That's the way it works in Ontario...
anyone can buy online first time  just skip the part where it ask you for a previous number , https://nyfgisales.a...Cookie=71348084
New York?   Call then.   But I already have a license number 1 (866) 933-2257
Thanks for the link.  I signed up and got my NY licence.  Works for first time buyers
